entry.title: é˜Ÿåˆ—
entry.content:
ä¸€.åŸºç¡€

ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šå…ˆå…¥å…ˆå‡ºï¼Œåå…¥åå‡º

æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

â€‹ 1ã€åˆ›å»ºé˜Ÿåˆ—å¯¹è±¡ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šArrayDequeã€LinkedListç­‰ã€‚

2ã€å…¥é˜Ÿæ“ä½œã€‚å°†å…ƒç´ æ·»åŠ åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„æœ«å°¾å¤„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨offer()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

3ã€å‡ºé˜Ÿæ“ä½œã€‚ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å¤´éƒ¨ç§»é™¤å¹¶è¿”å›å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨poll()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

4ã€peek()æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæŸ¥çœ‹é˜Ÿé¦–å…ƒç´ ã€‚å¦‚æœé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›nullã€‚

5ã€isEmpty()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ç”¨äºåˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œç©ºåˆ™è¿”å›trueã€‚

6ã€è·å–é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å¤§å°ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨size()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

7ã€æ¸…é™¤é˜Ÿåˆ—å†…çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨clear()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

äºŒ.é“¾è¡¨å®ç°ï¼ˆå•å‘ç¯å½¢å¸¦å“¨å…µï¼‰

  1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œhead å’Œ tailéƒ½æŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€ä¸ª åˆå§‹åŒ–èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å…ƒç´ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œç§»åŠ¨ tail æŒ‡é’ˆå³å¯
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.Queue;

public class LinkedListQueue<E> implements Iterable<E>{
        private static class Node<E> {
            E value;
            Node<E> next;

            public Node(E value, Node<E> next) {
                this.value = value;
                this.next = next;
            }
        }

        Node<E> head = new Node<>(null, null);
        Node<E> tail = head;
        private int size;                  //èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°
        private int capacity = Integer.MAX_VALUE;

        public LinkedListQueue(int capacity) {
            this.capacity = capacity;
            tail.next = head;
        }

        public LinkedListQueue() {
            tail.next = head;
        }

        public boolean offer(E value){
            if(isFull()){
                return false;
            }
            Node<E> added = new Node<>(value, head);
            tail.next = added;
            tail = added;
            size++;
            return true;
        }

        public E poll(){
            if(isEmpty()){
                return null;
            }
            Node<E> first = head.next;
            head.next = first.next;
            if(first == tail){
                tail = head;
            }
            size--;
            return first.value;
        }

        public E peek(){
            if(isEmpty()){
                return null;
            }
            return head.next.value;
        }

        public boolean isEmpty(){
            if(head.next == null){
                return true;
            }
            return false;
        }

        public boolean isFull(){
            return size == capacity;
//          return tail + 1 == head;
        }

        public Iterator<E> iterator(){
            return new Iterator<E>() {
                Node<E> p = head.next;                         //è®¾ç½®æŒ‡é’ˆéå†
                @Override
                public boolean hasNext() {
                    return p != head;                 //å¾ªç¯ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶
                }

                @Override
                public E next() {
                    E value = p.value;
                    p = p.next;
                    return value;
                }
            };
        }
    }

ä¸‰.ç¯å½¢æ•°ç»„å®ç°

  1. å®šä¹‰headï¼Œtailä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆ

  2. headæŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘å¤´ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 

  3. tailæŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å¾…æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®

  4. åˆå§‹æ—¶ï¼Œheadå’Œtailå…±åŒæŒ‡å‘ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®

  5. åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿæ»¡ï¼šï¼ˆtail + 1ï¼‰% length == head

  6. åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿç©ºï¼šhead == tail

    import java.util.Iterator;

public class ArrayQueue1<E> implements Iterable<E>  {
    private E[] array;
    private int head = 0;
    private int tail = 0;
    private int capacity;

    @SuppressWarnings("all")
    public ArrayQueue1(int capacity) {
        array = (E[]) new Object[capacity + 1];
    }

    public boolean offer(E value){
        if(isFull()){
            return false;
        }
        array[tail] = value;
        tail = (tail + 1) % array.length;
        return true;
    }

    public E poll(){
        if(isEmpty()){
            return null;
        }
        E value = array[head];
        head = (head + 1) % array.length;
        return value;
    }

    public E peek(){
        if(isEmpty()){
            return null;
        }
        return array[head];
    }

    public boolean isEmpty(){
        return head == tail;
    }

    public boolean isFull(){
        return (tail + 1) % array.length == head;
    }

    public Iterator<E> iterator(){
        return new Iterator<E>() {
            int p = head;                         //è®¾ç½®æŒ‡é’ˆéå†
            @Override
            public boolean hasNext() {
                return p != tail;                 //å¾ªç¯ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶
            }

            @Override
            public E next() {
                E value = array[p];
                p = (p + 1) % array.length;
                return value;
            }
        };  
    }
}

entry.title: æ ˆ
entry.content:
ä¸€ã€åŸºç¡€

äºŒã€æ•°ç»„å®ç°

ä¸‰ã€é“¾è¡¨å®ç°

import java.util.Stack;
import java.util.Iterator;


public class LinkedListStack<E> implements Iterable<E> {

    static class Node<E>{
        E value;
        Node<E> next;

        public Node(E value, Node<E> next) {
            this.value = value;
            this.next = next;
        }
    }
    
    private int capacity;
    private int size;
    private Node<E> head = new Node<E>(null, null);

    public LinkedListStack(int capacity) {
        this.capacity = capacity;
    }
    
    public boolean push(E value) {
        if (isFull()) {
            return false;
        }
        head.next = new Node<>(value, head.next);
        size++;
        return true;
    }

    public E pop() {
        if (isEmpty()) {
            return null;
        }
        Node<E> first = head.next;
        head.next = first.next;
        size--;
        return first.value;
    }

    public E peek() {
        if (isEmpty()) {
            return null;
        }
        Node<E> first = head.next;
        return first.value;
    }
    
    public boolean isEmpty() {
        return size == 0;
    }

    public boolean isFull() {
        return size == capacity;
    }

    @Override
    public Iterator<E> iterator() {
        return new Iterator<E>() {
            Node<E> p = head.next;
            @Override
            public boolean hasNext() {
                return p != null;
            }

            @Override
            public E next() {
                E value = p.value;
                p = p.next;
                return value;
            }
        };
    }
}
